sentences.en: America’s present need is not heroics, but calm diplomacy.
sentences.cn: 美国当前需要的不是逞英雄，而是冷静的外交。

sentences.en: But I did notice one thing. Her breathing seemed to become less labored after Wade's heroics.
sentences.cn: 不过我注意到了一件事,韦德的精彩表演后,她的呼吸似乎变得不那么吃力了.

sentences.en: Cut it out, Perry. You've performed your heroics. It's all over now.
sentences.cn: 住手吧，佩里。你已经逞过英雄了。现在一切都结束了。

sentences.en: England need heroics from the captain now.
sentences.cn: 英格兰队此刻需要队长采取英勇果断的行为。

sentences.en: He said his advice was: "No heroics, stay within the law"
sentences.cn: 他说自己的建议是：“不要逞英雄，要遵纪守法。”

sentences.en: Heroics are for those epic films they make in Hollywood.
sentences.cn: 夸张的英雄行为适用于他们在好莱坞制作的那些史诗大片.

sentences.en: How will heroics affect the Race to the MVP? Coach Erik Spoelstra, take it away, please.
sentences.cn: 韦德的精彩表现如何影响MVP的 争夺? 埃里克·斯波尔斯特拉教练, 请将MVP拿走吧.

sentences.en: I'll give them the most spectacular heroics anyone's ever seen!
sentences.cn: 我会向他们展现前无古人的最精彩的英雄表演!

sentences.en: In the hours and days after his heroics, nothing in Autrey's world has been the same.
sentences.cn: 在他这件英雄式的壮举后,时时刻刻 、 日夜夜,欧特里的世界已经完全改观.

sentences.en: Miller's self - styled heroics were a cold comfort for his team leader.
sentences.cn: 米勒自我标榜的英雄事迹对他的主管来说算不上什么安慰.

sentences.en: Not even Horry's heroics could have saved the Lakers on Tuesday.
sentences.cn: 在星期二晚上,就算是霍里的豪言壮语也救不了湖人.

sentences.en: Remember, no heroics, we just go in there and do our job.
sentences.cn: 记住，不要大肆宣扬，我们只要到那儿去干我们的活就行了。

sentences.en: The C 3 team specifically prohibits heroics, and works almost no overtime.
sentences.cn: C3团队明确禁止个人英雄主义, 而且几乎从不超时工作.

trans.tran_cn: （常指哗众取宠的）英雄辞令，（炫耀性的）豪壮行为，英雄诗体，有英雄气概的，英雄的，英勇的( heroic的名词复数 )
